arts.ttl: Charlton Athletic boss not prepared to take any risks with key performer
arts.sum: The defender has been a star performer for the Addicks this season but did not make the journey up to Field Mill. “He just had a little bit of a tight calf so we have just got to be careful with him,” said Addicks boss Jones.

arts.ttl: Charlton Athletic boss Nathan Jones on 2-1 win at Mansfield Town
arts.sum: Charlton Athletic manager Nathan Jones has described their points total as “a good haul” after tonight’s 2-1 victory at Mansfield Town. Charlton are 10 points clear of seventh-placed Reading, who do have a match in hand, but a play-off place looks almost assured.

arts.ttl: In-form Charlton edge hard-fought win at Mansfield
Mansfield boss Nigel Clough: Charlton Athletic are different animal to team we faced at Valley
arts.sum: Mansfield Town boss Nigel Clough has described Charlton Athletic as “a different animal” to the one they faced earlier in the season at The Valley. “The performance was not too good but the result was fine,” said Clough.
